ActorTalk: According to the rules, you only need to upload three photos on the designated platform to complete the check-in mission.
The only requirement is that one of them must feature the souvenir. The other two can be anything we like.
Then let's take the other two however we want.
Alright. We'll go wherever you want and take the pictures there.
We can try them all, then pick the one we like best to keep.
I've got a few spots in mind.
